website_summaries.verdict: These socks are a must-have if you enjoy venturing out into the wettest, coldest, and harshest environments because at the very least, your feet will remain dry and comfortable.
pros: Available in sizes small through XL
cons: Only available in black with aqua blue stripe

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in length of foot but wide on width of foot.
customer_reviews.text: Runs small in length of foot but wide on width of foot. I wear a size 9.5 B/C shoe. Thus I ordered the medium. These socks were nice but were short and wide for my foot. The texture of the sock was nice and it worked at keeping my feet dry. The picture above showing how the light blue strips surround the heel is not how it fit my foot, the top stripe was on the middle of my heel and thus did not hug my heel at all.
customer_reviews.author: watchenthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described as long as you don't go over the top. The top will not seal out water. As long as you stand in water below the top it works fine. Comfortable. As far as durability, I'm not sure but have worn them for two weeks and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Dry feet in all conditions. Yep, even when it is warm out and not raining, my feet didn't sweat in these. They are surprisingly breathable and comfortable. Oh, and they do keep your feet dry when it rains. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: O-well

customer_reviews.title: Work Great! I bought these for my first white water ...
customer_reviews.text: Work Great! I bought these for my first white water rafting trip. It was raining bad snowing while on the water the first couple of days and while everyone else's feet were freezing and wet mine stayed completely dry even when the sock was soaked! On the really cold days I would wear a pair of snowboarding whool socks underneath my waterproof socks and they would stay dry and keep me feet warm! I REALLY REALLY REALLY recommend these socks!
customer_reviews.author: julieb

customer_reviews.title: Real waterproof socks compared to construction boots that says waterproof.mom the word
customer_reviews.text: My son use this because his construction boots says waterproof but water still gets in it so this sucks is a rescue he can still keep his steel toe fake water boots and wear the socks and be comfortable he enjoys it and it works this is a real waterproof socks
customer_reviews.author: MAYFIELD M STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, only reason they did not get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, only reason they did not get a 5 is the top tends to roll down. very comfortable for this type of sock. Really do not know how waterproof yet, as I have not had boot failure or water over the top of my rubber boots yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: I recommend purchasing a size up as these tend to run ...
customer_reviews.text: These are waterproof, just don't allow water level to rise above top of the socks or it will soak the inside. Although water leaked into my Dexshell socks during a hike through cold rivers, these socks kept my feet warm. I recommend purchasing a size up as these tend to run small.
customer_reviews.author: JesQ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Purchased for my husband to use at work. Keeps your feet dry. Feels like it will get wet, but I assure you it doesn't. Must read the washing instructions, drying in the dryer will cause them to fail to work. The only thing that could be better is they are a little cold and they could be a little taller. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amara Evans

customer_reviews.title: I bought these socks for my daughter who rows crew ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for my daughter who rows crew. They are worth every penny. Keeps her feet warm and dry. They are durable!
customer_reviews.author: renee esposito

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like good product but runs small and even XL was too small/tight for size 12 wide foot. Returned without using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camping/hunting outdoors socks
customer_reviews.text: They work! I bought these for a friends birthday, immiediately he put them on and ran his foot under water, whay do ya know his foot was dry! Perfect camping/hunting outdoors socks. Highly recommended. They were his favorite gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cerius

customer_reviews.title: pretty good. I took them and wore them in ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, pretty good. I took them and wore them in Patagonia for three weeks. They keep your feet warm, not always perfectly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Clemencia Caporale

customer_reviews.title: They work well for me
customer_reviews.text: They've kept my feet dry so far. Keeping water out, and letting my feet breathe well enough.
customer_reviews.author: david g

customer_reviews.title: Not as warm as I need but layered with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm as I need but layered with a pair of normal socks I stay warm. And always dry even through stormy times.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.wood

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: These are my wife's favourite running socks. They keep our feet warm and dry, even when running in the cold and wet. I use them for mountain biking and have similarly good results.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Coleman

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these really work. More comfortable with a light sock underneath so the wet outer part of the sock doesn't make your feet cold. I'm a 6 1/2 - 7 and the small fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not sure what i expected. they are very thick. but do keep feet dry
customer_reviews.author: syndi

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Stepped right into a tub of water and feet were totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: They worked great and kept me dry through my soggy trail run
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant that these wouldn't breath enough however I was pleasantly surprised. They worked great and kept me dry through my soggy trail run. I'd recommend them in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Imixer

customer_reviews.title: Both love them. Very warm and truly is waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Gift for husband and son. Both love them. Very warm and truly is waterproof. Son uses them for winter camping and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Ladah

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it for a dog groomer like
customer_reviews.text: It definitely keeps the water out and your feet dry. Very worth it for a dog groomer like me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sock
customer_reviews.text: Lived up to my expectations. Waterproof and breathable. A little costly, but does what is advertised. Good comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: RON BIRCHFIELD

customer_reviews.title: The socks were great! The box
customer_reviews.text: The socks were great! The box, however, was a different story. It was totally destroyed. I had to tape it together, which was an unfortunate way give a present.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These work remarkably well. Hike through streams that were ...
customer_reviews.text: These work remarkably well. Hike through streams that were deeper than my boots, but these kept my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Purrcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for hunting. Keeps feet dry and warm all day. Wear socks underneath to keep feet sry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, a little tight around my toes so ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, a little tight around my toes so with extended use I'd worry about blisters. Fully water proof, a must have item for completing tasks in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these while sailing. Shoes wet... feet dry! Just what I wanted. Fit and finish is perfect. A little more expensive than I had hoped for but great performance so I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Silversailor

customer_reviews.title: Did not stay dry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear post operatively after surgery on my foot. The intent was to wear them in the shower to keep the operative site dry. Unfortunately the sock did not prevent water from getting through and allowed the surgical dressing to get extremely wet. I had even sealed the top of the sock to my leg with duct tape (ouch) to prevent seepage. If they failed during a brief shower I can't imagine how they would hold up wearing them all day in a wet environment. I can not recommend these because they are not waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, kept my feet dry and they were compfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a raft trip in Nepal. My feet stayed dry and warm. They fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: Wore them playing golf in a rain storm, held up most of the way, but nothing would stay dry in that rain. These did much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Emrick

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet dry
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. I wear them for Dragon boat racing. Keeps my feet dry. I wear thin sport socks under when weather is cold.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Sock It To Me
customer_reviews.text: These socks look good, feel great, do stay dry, and run big. Had to give them to my hubby. Will buy myself a size smaller. Hiked through Acadia for hours without sweaty or wet feet! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Winner of the OP
customer_reviews.text: These babies kept us warm and dry. We even tested it in a pool for 3 hours. Still no wet feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks to wear to use while hiking in cold water. When I first stepped into the water, I thought they were going to work perfectly. Unfortunately, after just a few minutes in the water, my feet were soaking wet. To make matters worse, it was holding IN the ice cold water! My hike was cut short because of this. Maybe I'm not using these correctly, but the photo on the box shows a sock being submerged in water and water repelling off the sock. That's how I understood these were supposed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Mom

customer_reviews.title: True Blue WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: They put the 'W' in "Waterproof" these socks are worth every penny. I've worn them to work from sprinkling rain to downpours and never had any issues. Congratulations Dexshell you have a lifetime customer...
customer_reviews.author: Da Amazonin-Man

customer_reviews.title: I haven't hiked so don't know how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: Completely waterproof. Filled the bathtub up and stood in it the second I opened them. I haven't hiked so don't know how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Erickson

customer_reviews.title: These socks are so amazing that I had to order another pair
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so amazing that I had to order another pair. My boyfriend loves them. He uses them for hunting or riding his dirt bike. They keep his feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Affolter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels like wearing diving gear, they were water proof but not comfortable. They don't contour to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Socks
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase. Really saved my trip to the mountains when I ran into snow and had forgotten my gators.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Mailman says...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the mailman! The mailman is my husband! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug2113

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I keep wearing these hoping they'll keep my feet dry. They don't.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Thick and cold
customer_reviews.text: These socks felt weird. They didn't allow water in but it was as if they did. If the sock did get wet you could feel the coldness even though your feet wasn't wet. They also weren't cozy. They do what they are supposed to do by keeping the water out but nothing else such as keeping your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: ... is incomplete but socks do breath and are very comfortable. I'll update after a ride in wet weather ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn in wet weather yet so review is incomplete but socks do breath and are very comfortable. I'll update after a ride in wet weather if they DON'T perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Strips

customer_reviews.title: Neat product. Black Magic.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. They are waterproof. I had my doubts but by god these things are cool!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing socks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband when he pump test on fire trucks because his feet get soaked and these amazing socks keep his feet so dry and this is using them 7+ hours at a time. Down fall is the price is a bit high but well worth it! And hate having to wash them by hand to be on the safe side I don't want to ruin them in my washer and letting them air dry takes 2-3 days to fully dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: No More Wet Feet
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great! I hate wet feet and wear these when it rains!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these to work at a car wash. They keep his feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: Renee Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son for his work. stayed dry. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Mostly waterproof. If you stay submerged for more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly waterproof. If you stay submerged for more than about 20 minutes water will begin to seep in, but with that exception, they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and keep the feet really warm and protected from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well i put my foot in a bucket of water and dry as a bone
customer_reviews.author: K_l

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts. Nice looking sock.... wish I had bought myself a pair! Might have to do that........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5\5 Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Saved myself a lot of money by not buying waterproof work boots. 5\5 Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you in more detail how these socks work out after our white water rafting trip next month! We have tried these on at home and they feel comfortable. The only negative is that there was not a specific enough size chart on-line and I had to guess which size of socks to purchase. I wear ladies size 7.5 shoe and the mediums fit me well, inconsistent with the on-line size chart (7.5 is equivalent to size 38). My daughter wears size 9 to 9.5 shoe and she is comfortable in the size large sock. My son wears men's shoe size 8 to 9 and was comfortable in the size large sock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I recently spent the night trekking through some deep snow trying to get to a site. Because we used the GPS i didnt really get to choose my path and it frequently led through streams. I wore a very thin sock liner (injinji) under these socks and was warm and dry the entire time. There was about 3" minimum of snow on the ground and i was in water above my ankles several times during the night. When i put my hand inside the sock it kind of reminds me of a wetsuit so im not sure i would wear them without a sock liner.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: The M was small on me and the L was perfect. Out of three kinds of waterproof socks these ...
customer_reviews.text: size 9.5 foot. The M was small on me and the L was perfect. Out of three kinds of waterproof socks these bunched up the least and seemed most like a normal pair of socks. I only wish they had some wool content since I have been in love with technical wool socks for nearly two decades. Hopefully the synthetic will not dissappoint
customer_reviews.author: scott klandl

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an Alaskan kayaking trip. They worked very well despite being in water. No complaints. For the price, excellent. Only objection was the smell when I was also wearing heavy boots over them but the smell dissipated immediately upon washing them in machine.
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: Mine are not waterproof at all. I walk in ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine are not waterproof at all. I walk in shallow water hunting for fossils. I wear sneakers over them. When I get home after a couple of hours, my feet are cold and soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: If you hate putting on cold wet paddle boots then I recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these in a weeklong kayak trip and they kept my feet dry and warm when I was wading in waist deep water. If you hate putting on cold wet paddle boots then I recommend these socks. We had days where we started with temps below freezing and my boots were iced over. I already bought a couple extra pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim s.

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase after used the first for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase after used the first for almost 2 years in cold weaher kayaking. Really warm and wet proof.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Winter Paddling in the Pacific Northwest
customer_reviews.text: I use these for outrigger paddling during the winter months. I wear them under a pair of leaky "waterproof" booties. I have used other waterproof socks in the past, but these are my current favorites. Why you ask? These manage to be waterproof and still feel like an actual sock. They provide some additional warmth as well, and hey, that's a sharp blue color they've got.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Taufaasau

customer_reviews.title: dry feet!
customer_reviews.text: Felt great in my motorcycle boots, feet stayed dry on a 8 hr rainy offroad ride
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good waterproof socks
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be fine. I used them last month in the Boundary Waters and they kept my feet dry. I wish they a bit longer, water can go over the tops, they are pretty much standard crew height.
customer_reviews.author: R. HOOVER

customer_reviews.title: these socks are awesome, not quite as warm as I expected
customer_reviews.text: these socks are awesome, not quite as warm as I expected, so wore a 200 weight liner sock, but overall, way better than wool or fleece socks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: We used these socks for a April Grand Canyon rafting trip. the water was about 42 degrees. They worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda P.

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks so much, I would wear them every day I work, if I could. They keep my feet dry and not clammy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Hunt

customer_reviews.title: My feet were dry and comfortable (the shoes were soaked in mud and muck)
customer_reviews.text: I used these and a pair of Brooks running shoes to hike through the mud of the Panama Jungle. My feet were dry and comfortable (the shoes were soaked in mud and muck). Only weakness is water will come in over the top. Great solution to wet environments.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke51

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: kept me warm but with heavy continuous rain the socks was eventually soaked.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift. As far as I know ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. As far as I know recipient likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanj

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant or waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The socks look nice and feel good but run small, so I ordered a size larger. As for being water resistant, the socks don't work as advertised. My feet were soaked early on, so I hauled hiking boot with wet socks off the day. I changed socks, then hauled 2 lb. socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought a pair of small. I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of small. I am a 9 1/2 foot, they fit and perform remarkable. I have been running up and down snow covered mountains in Glenwood springs Colorado. They work exactly as posted.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Tompach

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend who works in water all day. He absolutelyloves them! He said the socks are soaked when he takes them off but his feet are always dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dry socks, and sweat begone!
customer_reviews.text: These socks have been great for me. My feet stay dry when the weather and roads are wet (bike commuting). And surprisingly for a guy who sweats easily, my feet come out of these things dry. Thought I was imagining things at first, but I took note and repeatedly, dry feet come out of these even when I've worked up a good sweat otherwise on my 10k commute. Probably for that reason, no odour issues, but I'll be washing them soon anyway due to road dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever!
customer_reviews.text: leaked and did a crappy job of keeping feet dry!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: OK, but they don't keep out the cold very well.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Seattle and and have a long bike commute (~20 miles one way). Keeping my feet warm and dry is essential. These do keep out the rain, but my feet still chilled, though not as much as with wool socks and shoe covers. I guess I expected more, given the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Herter

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. I had a small leak in one boot in my waders and with just 3 weeks left in the duck hunting season I thought that this product would keep my foot dry until I would get some new waders next year, it did not. Might be good if you step in a puddle, but not good if in continuous contact with water.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return and purchase one pair size small.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j gieske

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sock and seems to work well but is very hard to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beware, these are NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: NOT Waterproof at all. Will draw in water and soak your feet. They are not even water resistant. Upon taking off the sock, my foot was quite damp. My metatarsal padding was soaked more than sweat could ever do.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: Happy and sad
customer_reviews.text: Just tried them on first impression totally comfortable seems legit, why the 3 stars then? they were suppose to be here August 17 today is August 20 kinda wish it was it was a pack of three.
customer_reviews.author: Joe nelson

product_meta.title: DexShell Coolvent Mid-Calf Waterproof Socks
product_meta.description: A mid calf, mid weight Coolmax terry loop sock with anti-bacterial Coolmax inner. More durable and suitable for cycling, riding, running and a wide range of professional outdoor sports in wet environments.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Lightweight mid-caf sock will keep you dry in any weather
Perfectly suitable for daily walking, hiking, and other outdoor activities in cold and wet weather conditions
Seamless construction for the highest comfort
Stay dry with Porelle waterproof breathable membrane
Moisture management thanks to the Coolmax technology
